com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUIDataTypeProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUIDataTypeProvider

    public interface ISCUIDataTypeProvider
    Provider interface which defines the contract that the framework expects from any Data Type Hanling Mechanism.
    An Application will need to implement this interface and register the implementation for handling Data Types.
    For any Data Type handling application will have to go through SCUIDataTypeHelper.

    Plugging the implementation:
    The implementation can be plugged into the framework using one of the following methods:
    • Making the below web.xml context parameter entry 
              <context-param>
                <param-name>scui-datatype-provider</param-name>
                <param-value>Fully qualified class name of the implementation</param-value>
        </context-param>
    • Calling the SCUIDataTypeHelper#setDataTypeProvider(SCUIContext, ISCUIDataTypeProvider) utility method
    hyadav

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISCUIDataType getDataType(java.lang.String nameDataType)
      This method returns the ISCUIDataType object given the name of the data type.
      java.util.Map getDataTypes()
      This method returns the map of all the data type objects.
      void init()
      Any initialization required by the application can be done here.
      boolean isValid(java.lang.String dataTypeName, java.lang.String value)
      This method takes in a datatype name and its value and validates the value against the given datatype and returns boolean.
      boolean isValid(java.lang.String dataTypeName, java.lang.String value, ISCUILocale locale)
      This method takes in a datatype name and its value and validates the value against the given datatype with respect to the passed locale and returns boolean.
      void loadDataTypeValidationRules(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Any provider should register datatype validation rules here.
      SCUIValidationResponse validate(java.lang.String dataTypeName, java.lang.String value)
      This method takes in a datatype name and its value and validates the value against the given datatype and returns a SCUIValidationResponse object.
      SCUIValidationResponse validate(java.lang.String dataTypeName, java.lang.String value, ISCUILocale locale)
      This method takes in a datatype name and its value and validates the value against the given datatype with respect to the passed locale and returns a SCUIValidationResponse object.
